rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, P2001, P3002})
For COURSE_CODE IN {3288, 4637, E3008} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {PSC1042} Otherwise Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {PSC2031}

description: The objective of this unit is to provide students with opportunities to develop their analytical skills by testing various hypothesis and strategies to solve authentic complex HPLC problems.On successful completion of this unit, students will have developed a systematic and critical approach to analytical method development that will be demonstrated by the creation of relevant and accurate resources usable in future jobs or studies.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
